description: This file defines API functions for managing notes, including fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes, with placeholder implementations for future backend integration.

methods.name: export async function fetchNotes(): Promise<Note[]> { fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches a list of notes, currently returns a stub with a sample note.

methods.name: export async function createNoteApi(note: Omit<Note, 'id'|'updatedAt'>): Promise<Note> { createNoteApi
methods.description: Creates a new note, currently returns a stub with a generated ID and timestamp.

methods.name: export async function updateNoteApi(note: Note): Promise<Note> { updateNoteApi
methods.description: Updates an existing note, currently returns the note with an updated timestamp.

methods.name: export async function deleteNoteApi(id: string): Promise<void> { deleteNoteApi
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID, currently a stub with no implementation.
